

Example ESR:
002 010001456 23453700 0102156429010020854 00000 02183 0 000000000 210618 210618 210618 00000000000000000000000
999 010001456 9999999999999999999999999990000000 02183 0 00000000001 210618 000000000000000000


ESR Nr. from invoice:
0100000 02183 0> 23453700 0102156429010020854+ 010001456>
0100000 01000 8> 00000005 8802156015010000620+ 000012345>


Example ESR:
002 000012345 00000005 8802156015010000620 00000 01000 0 000000000 210831 210831 210831 00000000000000000000000
999 000012345 9999999999999999999999999990000000 01000 0 00000000001 210831 000000000000000000
